pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast Algorithms for Large Scale Generalized Distance Weighted Discrimination // Solving large scale distance weighted discrimination. The main algorithm is a symmetric Gauss-Seidel based alternating direction method of multipliers (ADMM) method. See Lam, X.Y., Marron, J.S., Sun, D.F., and Toh, K.C. (2018) arXiv:1604.05473 for more details.
